snippet: A coalition of Islamist militias has vowed to eliminate a local unit of the Islamic State, testing its strength and emphasizing the deep divisions among the country’s Islamist forces.
abstract: Mujahedeen Shura Council, coalition of Islamist militias in Darnah, Libya, declares jihad on Islamic State local unit responsible for killing two council leaders.

byline.contributor: Suliman Ali Zway contributed reporting from Tripoli, Libya, and Merna Thomas from Cairo.

lead_paragraph: A coalition of Islamist militias has vowed to eliminate a local unit of the Islamic State, testing its strength and emphasizing the deep divisions among the country’s Islamist forces.

headline.main: Libya Groups Vow to Crush Unit of ISIS
headline.print_headline: Libya Groups Vow to Crush Unit of ISIS

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
